org.codehaus.griffon.jsilhouette.geom
Class Balloon

java.lang.Object
  org.codehaus.griffon.jsilhouette.geom.Balloon
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.Shape, java.lang.Cloneable
public class Balloon
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.Shape, java.lang.Cloneable

Defines a text balloon shape (like the ones used on tooltips & comics).

01 package org.codehaus.griffon.jsilhouette.geom;
02 
03 import java.awt.Color;
04 import java.awt.Graphics;
05 import java.awt.Graphics2D;
06 import java.awt.Dimension;
07 import java.awt.Rectangle;
08 import java.awt.RenderingHints;
09 import javax.swing.JFrame;
10 import javax.swing.JPanel;
11 import javax.swing.BorderFactory;
12 import javax.swing.SwingUtilities;
13 
14 public class BalloonExample {
15    public static JPanel canvas() {
16       return new JPanel() {
17          public void paint( Graphics g ) {
18             Balloon balloon = new Balloon(10, 10, 100, 100, 20, 20, 10,
19               Balloon.TAB_AT_BOTTOM, 0.5f, Balloon.ANGLE_AT_END);
20             Graphics2D g2d = (Graphics2D) g;
21             g2d.setRenderingHint(
22                RenderingHints.KEY_ANTIALIASING,
23                RenderingHints.VALUE_ANTIALIAS_ON
24             );
25             Rectangle bounds = getBounds();
26             g2d.setBackground(Color.WHITE);
27             g2d.fillRect(bounds.x, bounds.y, bounds.width, bounds.height);
28             g2d.setColor(Color.BLUE);
29             g2d.fill(balloon);
30             g2d.setColor(Color.BLACK);
31             g2d.draw(balloon);
32             g2d.drawRect(bounds.x, bounds.y, bounds.width-1, bounds.height-1);
33          }
34       };
35    }
36 
37    public static JFrame buildUI() {
38       JFrame frame = new JFrame("Balloon");
39       frame.getContentPane().add(canvas());
40       frame.setSize(new Dimension(130,160));
41       frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
42       return frame;
43    }
44 
45    public static void main( String[] args ) {
46       SwingUtilities.invokeLater( new Runnable() {
47          public void run() {
48             buildUI().setVisible(true);
49          }
50       });
51    }
52 }
